director_styles.Epic / Large Scale (Nolan): Grand scale architectures, visceral realism, physical practical effects, vast landscapes, 1.43:1 full IMAX height.
director_styles.Moody / Sci-Fi (Villeneuve): Atmospheric fog, silhouette lighting, brutalist architecture, monochromatic or bi-color palettes, 1.90:1 digital IMAX.
director_styles.Retro / Technicolor: Saturated primary colors, high contrast, golden age of Hollywood lighting, visible grain, 4:3 Academy ratio feel.
director_styles.Gritty / Documentary Style: Handheld 65mm feel, natural lighting, sweat and dirt detail, muted colors, high texture.

lens_presets.Panavision Ultra 70 (Anamorphic): 2x squeeze, intense oval bokeh, horizontal blue lens flares, sharp center with edge falloff.
lens_presets.IMAX Hasselblad (Spherical): Tack sharp from corner to corner, zero distortion, deep depth of field, 15/70mm resolution.
lens_presets.Vintage Cooke Anamorphic: Warm tones, subtle lens flares, painterly bokeh, organic texture.
lens_presets.Arri Alexa 65 (Digital Large Format): Ultra clean, massive dynamic range, modern glass characteristics.

shot_angles.Extreme Wide Shot (EWS): Establishing the vast environment, character is small in frame, 1.43:1 ratio.
shot_angles.Wide Shot (WS): Full body visible, clear relationship with environment.
shot_angles.Medium Shot (MS): Waist up, focusing on interaction and wardrobe detail.
shot_angles.Close-Up (CU): Tight on face, shallow depth of field, intense 70mm skin texture.
shot_angles.Low Angle (Hero): Looking up at character, making them appear powerful.
shot_angles.High Angle / Bird's Eye: Looking down, showing isolation or objective perspective.
shot_angles.Dutch Angle: Tilted horizon, creating tension and unease.

color_palettes.Classic Teal & Orange: Cool shadows, warm skin tones, high dynamic range pop.
color_palettes.Desaturated / Bleach Bypass: High contrast, gritty, muted colors, metallic feel.
color_palettes.Rich Technicolor Heritage: Deep reds and blues, high saturation, nostalgic 1950s epic feel.
color_palettes.Monochrome (Double-X): Hyper-detailed black and white, deep blacks, glowing silver highlights.
color_palettes.Neon Noir: Vibrant pinks and cyans against deep darkness.
